title: Very one-sided games
body: So im being put against gold/plat players(silvers too but i dont mind that)and im bronze 1, now im flattered you think im as good as a plat player, so i would like to know if im going to be awarded gold rank since this is a common occurence now, or is it basically just too bad that its a guaranteed loss if they arent boosted accounts?

replies.body:
Most of your ranked games you have been playing with mid-high bronze players and the occasional silvers. 

I guess you are meaning in your normal/ARAM games? I do see a couple of gold/plat players there. It's because normal MMR and ranked MMR are not the same. Higher ranked players usually have lower normal MMR as they don't play norms as much. 

It looks to me that you're at the right rank, with a 50% win rate over 200+ games. Doing pretty well lately, keep up the good work and continue looking to improve and i'm sure you'll get there eventually :)
LMAO yes most ranked is same tier, a few golds and above, and im joking about the insta ranked thing but its just silly to me that i can verse plats and golds as a b1 XD

> [{quoted}](name=About 9 Kenyans,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=xyBEHmle,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2016-10-20T00:37:59.762+0000)
>
> LMAO yes most ranked is same tier, a few golds and above, and im joking about the insta ranked thing but its just silly to me that i can verse plats and golds as a b1 XD

Nothing silly about vsing higher ranks in normals as it is totally different from ranked....
so you would find it fun to verse a challenger tier player every game?

> [{quoted}](name=About 9 Kenyans,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=xyBEHmle,comment-id=000200000000,timestamp=2016-10-20T03:04:21.175+0000)
>
> so you would find it fun to verse a challenger tier player every game?

Yes. I have versed challenger players in nirmals and ranked 5's in the past. It is quite fun. Learning by watching. Learning by getting dominated.

i dont plan on getting to their lvl of playing, i like having a life outside of a game, i suppose to each their own, but interest is playing against people that play for enjoyment casually not dedicate their lives to this game..

Not sure if serious 

Haven't seen anyone higher than silver 3 in any of your ranked games lately. You don't get gold rank until you get into there, regardless of who your facing
